DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Overall achievement1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Record here your assessment of the employees achievement against set objectives

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Client Focus1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Builds and sustains long-term relationships, understanding, trust and respect. Focuses in an effective way

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Communication and Impact1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Conveys information clearly, accurately and succinctly and adjusts to the audience's needs and requirements. Has credibility and impact, uses a range of effective interpersonal skills to persuade others to adopt a particular position and/or take action.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Developing Self (Learning)1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Is concerned to continuously expand their own skill set and specific knowledge of business. Remains abreast of developments in own area, creates and pursues own development plan and finds opportunities to achieve own objectives.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Drive and Commitment1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Has the determination, effort and enthusiasm to deliver results. Is energetic, takes the initiative, originates action and keeps things moving

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Innovation1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: The inclination and ability to challenge the status quo, and to generate new ideas and creative approaches which move the business forward.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Judgement and Decision Making1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Selects and uses relevant information to make sound and balanced judgements. Evaluates the risks of alternative options and makes confident decisions in the face of uncertainty or incomplete knowledge.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Planning and Organising1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Is personally well organized and keeps focused on priorities in own and others' work. Develops and monitors clear and realistic action plans to accomplish given objectives using given resources.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Problem Analysis1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Identifies and examines problems in order to understand them, generates options and recommends solutions which are logical, reasonable and realistic.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Professional Behaviour1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Dependable, reliable and accountable for own behaviour. Additionally, acts within professional, legal and ethical boundaries and guidelines.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Quality and Continuous Improvement1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Strives to enhance processes and procedures, and to improve quality and efficiency. Additionally, collates and captures organizational knowledge for the benefit of themselves and others.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Resilience and Stress Management1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Flexible, tolerates changes in methods, approaches and objectives. Maintains their performance and confidence in difficult, stressful, ambiguous and challenging circumstances.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Teamwork1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Co-operates and collaborates with colleagues inside and outside own area to achieve shared goals. Contributes actively to help create effective partnerships, which meet organizational objectives.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Overall assessment: Behavioral Competencies1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Record here your overall assessment of the employees Behavioral Competencies

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Comments1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Record here your overall assessment of the employees Behavioral Competencies

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Business and Financial Focus1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Drives for and focuses on business success and profitability, shows concern for financial stewardship and the proper management of financial resources

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Leadership1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Motivates and inspires others by providing a compelling vision of shared goals and objectives. Is courageous in challenging the status quo and remains committed to the common global strategy.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Managing and Developing People1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Manages, supports and encourages others through training, empowerment, role modelling and coaching. Addresses performance issues and creates development opportunities for others, helping them build their own careers.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Strategic Perspective and Global Awareness1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates a broad-based view of business issues, events and activities and an understanding of their wider implications and long-term impact.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Valuing Diversity1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Values views opinions and insights from all individuals. Promotes an inclusive culture, leverages the perspectives and experiences of others to gain competitive advantage.

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Overall assessment: Leadership Capabilities1
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Record here your overall assessment of the employees Leadership Capabilities

DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.LABEL: Comments12
DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES.DESCRIPTION: Record here your overall assessment of the employees Leadership Capabilities
